author: Matthew Dial
comment: Weather seems inaccurate by a long shot. It's close to 80 here and the app says 71. The forecast for the next three days is mid to upper 70s but the app says 60s

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hello Matthew,

I am sorry to hear of your issue. Can you please tell me if this is happening with automatic or manual weather?

Thanks,
AngCorp

author: Bruce Jackson
comment: Steps and battery gauges don't seem to be refreshing.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Bruce,

I am sorry to hear of your issue. Can you please send me an E-Mail to angcorp.dev@gmail.com with more info - what smartwatch do you have with what version of Android Wear and what handheld device with what OS?
Also - do you get updates of the steps on the big gauges?

Thanks in advance!

author: Mila Pacheva
comment: I like Gauge a lot! Great watch face with so many and so nice customization features!

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content: Thank you Mila! I am happy you like the watch! :)

comment: Amazing watch face.  The level of customization is of highest level! Recommended

author: Ivan Spasov
comment: It is a nice watch face with plenty of customization options

author: Георги Ангелов
comment: Awesome watch face. The level of customization is amazing - you can make it look sporty or classical or even funny. The weather and steps features are nice and the interctivity provides easy access to everything needed!  Highly recommended!

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content: Thank you Georgi! I appreciate that!
